Action.author: juliancarrivick
Action.body: I think the reason for this is that goimports doesn't seem to search the vendors folder for packages.

Action.author: bgorman
Action.body: ~juliancarrivick yeah you're likely right judging by the goimports output. Perhaps GOPATH should be set correctly in scripts/goimports.sh instead?

Action.author: bgorman
Action.body: Found a way simpler method to resolve this. Rather than trying to enforce the package names == directory names that goimports assumes, we can fix the vendoring behaviour in goimports by using `goimports -srcdir $GOPATH/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric`
